A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Overall a really good movie and interesting twists with really strong performances. One weaker sequence at kanto bite doesn't really seem to fit in with the movie but still entertaining and does not ruin the film for me. Many hardcore star wars fans could have an issue with some of the choices that were made but i think it was the right way. Overall the last jedi ranks as one of the best star wars film to date.
